summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ClipCutter YouTube video processing app. All core features working correctly including home page, creation flow, job processing, and results display.

design_issues.issue: Only showing 1 clip in grid instead of expected 4 clips from backend

passed_tests: Home page loading with hero section and CTAs
URL parameter passing from home to create page
Job creation form submission and progress tracking

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major flows working, minor display issue with clips count
